title: Alcohol: the problem with drinking
creator_credit: Don Anderson, Tasmanian Film Corporation, Alcohol and Drug Dependency Board of Tasmania and Sherry James
brief_description: The problem of teenage/adolescent drinking. Discusses some of the reasons why they drink, their attitude towards alcohol, and some problems associated with drinking. Suitable for secondary school level.
creator_credit_for_label: Don Anderson, Tasmanian Film Corporation, Alcohol and Drug Dependency Board of Tasmania and Sherry James
